home.heroTitle: Road to a Driver's License Made Easy
home.heroSubtitle: Join thousands of satisfied users who have simplified their licensing process.

trafficSignSection.title: It's Easy to Get Your Driver's License
trafficSignSection.description: YesilDefter makes it easy to get your driver's license. Our app helps you navigate the process and get your license in no time.

licenceJourneySection.title: Your Journey to License
licenceJourneySection.description: Step by step guide to getting your driver's license with interactive videos and much more.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.testimonial1: YesilDefter made my application process so easy!
testimonials.testimonial2: I got my license without any hassle, thanks to this app.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How do I start my application?
faq.answer1: Click on 'Get Started for Free' and follow the instructions.
faq.answer2: You will need your ID and proof of residence.
